columns.name: name
columns.description: Resource name associated with the resource.

columns.name: id
columns.description: Resource ID represents the complete path to the resource.

columns.name: type
columns.description: Resource type represents the complete path of the form Namespace/ResourceType/ResourceType/...

columns.name: data_source_name
columns.description: User Friendly Name of the DataSource.

columns.name: is_user_triggered
columns.description: Indicates whether the job is adhoc(true) or scheduled(false).

columns.name: operation
columns.description: Type of Job i.e. Backup:full/log/diff ;Restore:ALR/OLR; Tiering:Backup/Archive ; Management:ConfigureProtection/UnConfigure.

columns.name: operation_category
columns.description: Indicates the type of Job i.e. Backup/Restore/Tiering/Management.

columns.name: progress_enabled
columns.description: Indicates whether progress is enabled for the job.

columns.name: source_resource_group
columns.description: Resource Group Name of the Datasource.

columns.name: data_source_set_name
columns.description: Data Source Set Name of the DataSource.

columns.name: duration
columns.description: Total run time of the job. ISO 8601 format.

columns.name: etag
columns.description: An unique read-only string that changes whenever the resource is updated.

columns.name: backup_instance_id
columns.description: ARM ID of the Backup Instance.

columns.name: restore_type
columns.description: Indicates the sub type of operation i.e. in case of Restore it can be ALR/OLR.

columns.name: error_details
columns.description: A List, detailing the errors related to the job.
